    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static final ServiceHandler of(java.lang.Object... handlers)
        Create service handler composed of a set of service handlers. Service handlers either (a) implement ServiceHandler or implement service request methods, e.g. methods in SessionServiceSetHandler.
        Parameters:
        handlers - service handlers.
        Returns:
        a new service handler

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Object o)
        Add ServiceHandler or Service handling object. ServiceHandler is added as is, other objects are inspectew with reflected and suitable service handling methods are added. A method is suitable for service handing if it has no return arguments and one parametrized argument of EndpointServiceReqest. For example: new Object() { public void onTestStack( EndpointServiceRequest req) {} }
        Parameters:
        o - ServiceHandler or Service handling object.

      • getServiceHandlers

        public ServiceHandler[] getServiceHandlers()

      • serve

        public void serve(EndpointServiceRequest<?,?> request)
           throws ServiceResultException
        Description copied from interface: ServiceHandler
        Serve a service request.

        The implementation is allowed to may submit the response later and from another thread.

        Specified by:
        serve in interface ServiceHandler
        Throws:
        ServiceResultException

      • supportsService

        public boolean supportsService(java.lang.Class<? extends IEncodeable> clazz)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceHandler
        Queries whether this handler supports a given request class.
        Specified by:
        supportsService in interface ServiceHandler
        Parameters:
        clazz - class
        Returns:

      • getSupportedServices

        public void getSupportedServices(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IEncodeable>> result)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceHandler

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
